    • Method Detail

      • prepareDoubleSpinner

        public static final void prepareDoubleSpinner(javafx.scene.control.Spinner<java.lang.Double> theSpinner,
                                              double theMin,
                                              double theMax)

        Prepares double spinner with min and max values.

        Editable spinners do not change their value on exiting with tab, thus the complicated initialization.

        Code from: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/32340476/manually-typing-in-text-in-javafx-spinner-is-not-updating-the-value-unless-user

        Parameters:
        theSpinner - spinner to prepare
        theMin - min value
        theMax - max value
        Since:
        0.15.0

      • prepareIntegerSpinner

        public static final void prepareIntegerSpinner(javafx.scene.control.Spinner<java.lang.Integer> theSpinner,
                                               int theMin,
                                               int theMax)

        Prepares integer spinner with min and max values.

        Editable spinners do not change their value on exiting with tab, thus the complicated initialization.

        Code from: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/32340476/manually-typing-in-text-in-javafx-spinner-is-not-updating-the-value-unless-user

        Parameters:
        theSpinner - spinner to prepare
        theMin - min value
        theMax - max value
